room_title: Escape room "Electric Chair" by Mastermind Room Escape in St. Louis
review: I did “The Electric Chair” room for my birthday and it was so fun! Our host (Rob I think his name is) was great! He was helpful with the clues and was enthusiastic. I will definitely go back to participate in another room!

room_title: Escape room "Electric Chair" by Mastermind Room Escape in St. Louis
review: This was my first time ever doing an escape room. We completed the Electric Chair room within the given time frame. Our GameMaster, Richard, was awesome! 10/10, would do another escape room with Mastermind.

room_title: Escape room "Electric Chair" by Mastermind Room Escape in St. Louis
review: Myself and three others made it through the Electric Chair room and had a blast. Already to do another room.

room_title: Escape room "Electric Chair" by Mastermind Room Escape in St. Louis
review: It was so much fun. The workers were all very friendly and the facility was nice. We did the electric chair which were not able to escape but fun anyway. I will definitely be going back!

room_title: Escape room "Electric Chair" by Mastermind Room Escape in St. Louis
review: So much fun! The Electric Chair is challenging and the room set up and props are great! Thank you for being wheelchair accessible, most are not and this allowed the whole family to participate. We will be back!
